headline: How the Narrative Surrounding Hasbro Is Changing as Gaming and Magic Drive the Next Chapter
summary: Hasbro's narrative is shifting as analysts lift their price targets, keeping fair value steady at $91.54 per share while nudging the discount rate from 7.61% to 7.68% to reflect a slightly higher required return. With long term revenue growth assumptions effectively unchanged at 5.25% annually, the move is being justified by renewed confidence in the durability of Magic: The Gathering demand and a strengthening video game roadmap that could support sustained earnings power. Stay tuned to see...
